sentences.en: Even her soul, so strong for rhapsody, was not enough.
sentences.cn: 甚至于她那特别善于狂想的灵魂也不足挂齿.
李斯特: 匈亚利狂想曲,作品2.

sentences.en: Intoxicating rhapsody became a scratching claw.
sentences.cn: 令人陶醉的狂想曲成了撕心的利爪.

sentences.en: Martin paused from his rhapsody, only to break out afresh.
sentences.cn: 马丁暂停了他的狂欢颂, 只是为了重新说下去.
哦,天哪! 莉娜的结婚狂想曲!

sentences.en: The rhapsody reminds people of a vast plain.
sentences.cn: 这段狂想曲能令人联想到那辽阔的草原!

sentences.en: Towards the despair of Rhapsody, Capriccio!
sentences.cn: 绝望への狂想曲迫り来る空岛の消灭!

words.tran_cn: 狂热地说；把…写成狂想诗文

trans.tran_en: a piece of music that is written to express emotion, and does not have a regular form
